title: Authentication System Implementation
description: Build the core authentication system with JWT tokens, bcrypt password hashing, user registration/login APIs, and authentication middleware. This phase provides the security foundation for all protected features.

phases.title: JWT Token Infrastructure Setup
phases.description: Set up JWT token generation, verification, and refresh token system with proper configuration

phases.title: Password Security Implementation
phases.description: Implement bcrypt password hashing, salt generation, and password comparison functions

phases.title: User Registration API
phases.description: Create comprehensive user registration endpoint with validation, email verification, and error handling

phases.title: User Login API
phases.description: Develop secure login endpoint with authentication, token generation, and session management

phases.title: Authentication Middleware
phases.description: Create middleware for protecting routes, token validation, and user authentication checks

phases.title: Token Refresh & Logout
phases.description: Implement token refresh mechanism and secure logout functionality with token invalidation

phases.title: Password Recovery System
phases.description: Build password reset functionality with secure token generation and email delivery

phases.title: Authentication Testing & Validation
phases.description: Comprehensive testing of all authentication components and security validation
